body: Sorry guys, I know I have been inactive, but it is due to many injuries I have recently acquired. I am leave for Las Vegas for a month now, k bye
body_tagged: Sorry guys, I know I have been inactive, but it is due to many injuries I have recently acquired. I am leave for Las Vegas for a month now, k bye
title: Gone, but not gone.

replies.body: Bye, but these kinds of posts aren't allowed
replies.body_tagged: Bye, but these kinds of posts aren't allowed

replies.body:
As Blaze said posts surrounding personal updates aren't allowed on the forums, but I hope you get better soon and enjoy your time in Las Vegas!
